articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Bangladesh call for neutral umpires after South Africa controversy
articles.description: Bangladesh called for the return of neutral umpires in international cricket after claiming "inconsistent" decisions put them at a disadvantage in the first Test against South Africa currently being played in Durban.
articles.content:
Bangladesh called for the return of neutral umpires in international cricket after claiming "inconsistent" decisions put them at a disadvantage in the first Test against South Africa in Durban.

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Imran Khan's fate as Prime Minister to be decided by Pakistan's highest court
articles.description: The former World Cup-winning cricket captain who dissolved parliament to prevent opposition moves to oust him as Prime Minister wants to stay on as leader until fresh elections are held within 90 days.
articles.content:
Pakistan's top court will meet later on Monday to decide on the fate of Prime Minister Imran Khan, after his party blocked a no-confidence vote.
